pullrequest.title: Make both clang-tidy and cppcheck happy

content.html:

         std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(this->mutex);
+        // cppcheck-suppress postfixOperator
         result = this->idCounter++;
         this->idMap[result] = this->components.size();
         // Copy the component
